response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am eager to share it with you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $1,400,000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, allowing you to enjoy substantial savings while ensuring a significant return for me. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together on this exciting endeavor.", "product_price": 1400000}
